name: Hunter's Legacy
summary: Hunter’s Legacy is an old-school 2D single-player Metroidvania platformer where you control Ikki, a fierce kitty skilled with twin swords and a bow, better known as the Great Huntress of Un'Amak.
info:
• 中文名: 猎人遗产
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 平台冒险
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年7月19日
  • 售价: $6.99/￥28
